Room.Name: Rocky Cove on the Ramdes River
Room.ShortDescription: You are on the banks of a river in a marshy, prehistoric swampland.
Room.LongDescription: Before you lies a vast valley, filled with plant and animal life which are from another time. A thick fog clouds the landscape, making it difficult to see beyond a few meters. the humidity and temperature are uncomfortable, and biting insects swarm around you constantly.
